ご覧: (ごらん) - (after the -te form of a verb)  (please) try to; (please) look; seeing/looking/watching
ご覧ください: (ごらんください) - please look at it
ご覧なさい: (ごらんなさい) - (please) look; see (used to emphasize that an earlier prediction was correct); (after the -te form of a verb) (please) try to do
ご覧なさる: (ごらんなさる) - to see; to look; to watch
ご覧になる: (ごらんになる) - to see/to look/to watch; (after the -te form of a verb) try to
ご覧に入れる: (ごらんにいれる) - to show; to display
ご覧に成る: (ごらんになる) - to see/to look/to watch; (after the -te form of a verb) try to
ご覧のように: (ごらんのように) - as you can see
ご覧の様に: (ごらんのように) - as you can see
ご覧の通り: (ごらんのとおり) - as you see
ご覧下さい: (ごらんください) - please look at it
ご親切に: (ごしんせつに) - Thank you; How nice of you; That's kind of you
ご親拝: (ごしんぱい) - worship by the emperor at a shrine
ご託: (ごたく) - tedious talk; impertinent talk; repetitious talk; saucy speech; pretentious statement
ご詠歌: (ごえいか) - pilgrim's song; pilgrim's hymn; song in praise of the Buddha
ご連絡: (ごれんらく) - to contact/to get in touch; contacting/getting in touch/communication/(your) call/(your) message
ご連絡申し上げます: (ごれんらくもうしあげます) - I am writing ....; we are contacting ...
ご遠慮ください: (ごえんりょください) - please refrain from ~ (e.g. smoking, etc.)
ご遠慮下さい: (ごえんりょください) - please refrain from ~ (e.g. smoking, etc.)
ご都合主義: (ごつごうしゅぎ) - opportunism; double standards; timeserving; expediency
ご霊前: (ごれいぜん) - "before the spirit of the deceased" (written on the condolence-money envelope)
ご飯粒: (ごはんつぶ) - grain of boiled rice
ご馳走: (ごちそう) - feast/treating (someone); to treat (someone, e.g. to a meal)
ご馳走さま: (ごちそうさま) - word used after one has been treated (esp. used after a meal); used after hearing something lovey-dovey
ご馳走様でした: (ごちそうさまでした) - That was a delicious meal (said after meals); What a wonderful meal
さ: (さ) - -ness (nominalizing suffix indicating degree or condition); (sentence end, mainly masc.) indicates assertion; come/come now
さあ: (さあ) - come/come now/come along/go on/hurry up; well/who knows/I don't know.../uh/hmm; (said when surprised or happy) well now/let's see/there we go/all right; about that/you see
さあさあ: (さあさあ) - come, come/come/come now; here you go/here/when handing something
さあっと: (さあっと) - relatively quickly (esp. actions); quite suddenly (esp. wind, rain, etc.)
さいの目: (sainome) - pip (spot on a die); small cube (especialmente de comida), die, dice
さいまき: (さいまき) - kuruma prawn (esp. a small one, i.e. less than 10 cm in length)
さい帯血: (さいたいけつ) - umbilical cord blood
さえ: (すら) - even; if only; if just; as long as; the only thing needed
さえあれば: (さえあれば) - if only (you) have; as long as (you) have; whenever (you) have
さえすれば: (さえすれば) - you have only to; all you have to (do); all that's required; as long as; if only
さえに: (さえに) - furthermore; and another thing; even as
さえも: (すらも) - even; if only; if just; as long as; the only thing needed
さがし出す: (さがしだす) - to track down; to locate; to find out; to smoke out; to ferret out; to chase up; to discover
さくさく: (サクサク) - crisp (not moist or juicy)/crunchy/flaky (as in pastry); crunching sound (of walking on snow, frost, sand, etc.); doing skillfully and efficiently/doing quickly/proceeding smoothly; sound of pouring liquid; speaking clearly
さくっ: (サクッ) - with a crunching or grinding sound; quickly/promptly/abruptly/simply/efficiently; crispily/crunchily
さくらめーる: (さくらメール) - congratulatory postcards with a spring pattern sold every year in February
さくらメール: (さくらメール) - congratulatory postcards with a spring pattern sold every year in February
さくら味噌: (さくらみそ) - miso mixed with minced great burdock, ginger, etc. and sweetened with sugar
さくら貝: (サクラガイ) - Nitidotellina nitidula (species of tellin)
さく乳器: (さくにゅうき) - breast pump; milking device/milking machine
ささくれ: (sasakure) - fine split (por exemplo, em madeira); hangnail
ささくれる: (ささくれる) - to split finely/to splinter/to get frayed; to become irritable
ささくれ立つ: (ささくれだつ) - to split finely/to splinter/to get frayed; to become irritable/to feel on edge
ささげ持つ: (ささげもつ) - to hold something reverently with both hands
さざめく: (ざざめく) - to be boisterously noisy
さざれ石: (さざれいし) - pebbles/gravel; boulder formed from gravel and sediment
さし: (さし) - blowfly maggots used as fishing bait; marble pattern (in beef)
さしすせそ: (さしすせそ) - the five fundamental seasonings used in Japanese cooking: (in order) sugar, salt, vinegar, soy sauce, miso
さし出す: (さしだす) - to present; to submit; to tender; to hold out
さし迫る: (さしせまる) - to be urgent; to be pressing; to be imminent
さじを投げる: (さじをなげる) - to give up (something as hopeless); to throw in the towel
さじ加減: (sajikagen) - measured amount (especialmente de medicina), dosing, quantity, prescription; manner of seasoning; making adjustments based on experience, doing something by feel, skill, knack
さす: (さす) - to make (someone) do; to allow (someone) to; auxiliary verb indicating the causative; auxiliary verb indicating that one has been granted the permission to do something; auxiliary verb used as an honorific for others' actions; swidden
さすけね: (サスケネ) - (from 差し支えがない) no problem; that's OK
させて頂く: (させていただく) - to have the privilege of doing
させる: (させる) - (せる is for 五段 verbs, させる for 一段; follows the imperfective form of  and  verbs; senses 1-3 of せる are sometimes abbreviated as 〜す) auxiliary verb indicating the causative; (usu. as 〜(さ)せてもらう, 〜(さ)せていただく, etc.) auxiliary verb indicating that one has been granted the permission to do something; (as 〜(さ)せられる, 〜あら(さ)せられる, 〜(さ)せ給う, etc.) auxiliary verb used as an honorific for others' actions
さっき: (さっき) - some time ago; just now
さっぱり: (さっぱり) - feeling refreshed/feeling relieved; neat/trimmed; plain/simple; completely/entirely; not in the least (in sentence with negative verb)/not at all; completely ignorant/not doing at all
さっぱり分かりません: (さっぱりわかりません) - having no inkling of; having no idea of
